amendment.description: To make available from Procurement of Ammunition, Air Force, up to $5,000,000 for the procurement of Radiation Hardened Microelectronics.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4792 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4792 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Coleman. (consideration: CR S8600) To make available from Procurement of Ammunition, Air Force, up to $5,000,000 for the procurement of Radiation Hardened Microelectronics.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4792 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4792 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Coleman.
